content: this beautiful sweetheart scarf crochet pattern is a wonderful addition to the sweetheart beanie and will make the perfect set for gifting this beautiful scarf continues the puff heart pattern from its corresponding beanie also found here in my shop the stitch pattern gives the scarf a lacy look but it s one that is so cozy due to the puff stitches another bonus for this scarf is that it works up surprisingly quickly it s the perfect set for gifting and/or donating this listing is for a crochet pattern only this crochet pattern is written in american crochet terms this crochet pattern is available in english only a free copy of this crochet pattern can be found on my ad supported website https //richtexturescrochet com a free video tutorial for this pattern can be found on my youtube channel https //www youtube com/c/richtexturescrochet skill level intermediate gauge 16 sts x 8 row of half_double_crochet = 4 inches finished size 6 x 63 inches laid flat yarn wool-ease® by lion brand® yarn 80% acrylic 20% wool 197 yds/180 m 3oz/85 g 4 medium/worsted weight 2 balls of fisherman hook size h/8 5 mm hook adjust hook size if necessary to obtain correct gauge optional attach fringe to each end
